Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Kapok Shenzhen Bay in Shenzhen (Nanshan), you'll be close to Shenzhen University and Window of the World. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Xin'an Nantou Ancient City and He Xiangning Art Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 242 air-conditioned rooms featuring private spa tubs and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including a health club and an indoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Kapok Shenzhen Bay in Shenzhen (Nanshan), you'll be close to Shenzhen University and Window of the World. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Xin'an Nantou Ancient City and He Xiangning Art Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Shenzhen University - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Window of the World - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Xin'an Nantou Ancient City - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
He Xiangning Art Museum - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Happy Valley - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Zhongshan Park - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Splendid China Folk Village - 4.3 km / 2.6 mi
Chinese Overseas City - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Mangrove Seashore Ecological Park - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Shekou Ferry Terminal - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Shenzhen International Garden and Flower Expo Park - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Chiwan Tin Hau Temple - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Shenzhen Polytechnic - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Tomb of the Young Song Emperor - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Donghai Cultural Square - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Kapok Shenzhen Bay is Shenzhen (SZX-Shenzhen Intl.) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
